name: Fishy Towers Demo
description:
Fishy Towers Demo

Dive in a clear water of coral reef and defend against creatures from the deep dark!

Fishes who have lived in a darkness for ages now are grasping for our homeland - the coral reef. Collect seaweed and place protectors of this land to defeat invaders and bring peace to our home.

This is a sneak peek into full game we are working on, right now we have:

- 7 unique turret-fishes

- 5 enemies (can u get to the Shark?)

- possibly endless gameplay (how far can you get?)

In the full version you can expect:

- more turret-fishes

- more enemies as well

- BOSS FIGHTS

- more interesting progress

- more board variants

- hats/skins

- enrichment of the audio visual layer

We are open to the suggestions so let us know what you think! All feedback and ideas are appreciated.


Used assets:
https://cassala.itch.io/bubble-sprites

https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/stone-texture-buttons-game-app-interface-men...
